subject: Remove manual tone reveal, automatically show tones on chat entry
body:
Simplified UX by removing the tap-to-reveal interaction for message tones. Now messages are automatically marked as read and tones are revealed when entering a chat screen.

Changes:
- Auto-mark messages as read on chat entry (300ms delay after load)
- Remove "Reveal All" button and tap-to-reveal hints
- Always display sender tones on all messages
- Free up message tap gesture for future features (replies/reactions)
- Update documentation to reflect automatic reveal behavior

Technical:
- Renamed revealAll to markAllAsRead in useMessages hook
- Removed tagTone function (manual single message acknowledgment)
- Removed unreadCount from useMessages return type
- Simplified MessageBubble to always show tones
- Messages still use receiver_tone=[] and read_at for tracking
title: Remove manual tone reveal, automatically show tones on chat entry
